name: Ionic-Vue
headline: Ionic bindings for Vue applications
description: Use the beautiful Ionic UI library with Vue applications. This adapter bridges Ionic internals to Vue and Vue Router, allowing seamless integration of the two frameworks.

content.title: Ionic-Vue is now part of Ionic.
content.description: Modus Create contributed the Ionic Vue adapter library to the Ionic core. Ionic-Vue has become @ionic/vue.

pageTitle: Ionic Vue - Ionic 4 components in VueJS apps
pageDescription: Ionic-Vue bridges Ionic internals to Vue and Vue Router, allowing seamless integration of the two frameworks.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: ionic vue js, ionic framework, vuejs, ionic in vue, ionic with vuejs
